amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph within section 2 pertaining to offshore exclusions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude any oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the South Atlantic Planning Area, the Straits of Florida Planning Area, or in any area of the Eastern Gulf of Mexico that is referred to in section 104(a) of the Gulf of Mexico Energy Security Act of 2006.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 219 (Roll no. 39).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 219 (Roll no. 39).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
